description:
Chuta ends up being transferred to investigations division 4. The head of division 4, Vega Victor, seems rather laid back and tells Chuta to talk to him casually since they’re close in age, and they immediately hit it off. The two of them get invited to go to the art museum by Tateyan, but the exhibit there happened to be paintings of a bunch of naked women. Chuta then suddenly gets a message on his police badge. Meanwhile, the evil crime organization DeMille makes their next move to try to take over Earth...
Source: crunchyroll
